patthana8.58:4.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.58:5.1: Nanabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.58:6.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbañca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.58:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
